reviewText: Really good movie. The music didn't seem on par with other Coastal Crew productions but the cinematography was stunning and the riding was awesome.
Great MTB movie. Awesome euro/house soundtrack, and I actually like the shorter length of the vid. Makes you want to get out and ride your bike!
When they say "the film is from us - the riders" they mean it! Truly and amazing film from MTB rider to MTB riders. If you love to ride this film is for you!
If you enjoy mountain biking or even just appreciate nature and the outdoors, this is a fantastic movie.  Great soundtrack and cinematography.
This movie has numerous great segments.  Its good from the beginning to the end and each segment contains enough of a segway to keep the viewer interested.

It's mostly a collection of guys jumping over and off of stuff.  BIG stuff!  These guys got some huge eggs, no doubt!  But thats really the focus of the video.  I guess I should have expected that... But I thought there would be more freeride stuff.
